item.title: 02 - Coriolis Force and Inertial Oscillation
item.description: 科氏力 科氏力 2D 条件下科氏力 所谓的科氏力，是在非惯性系下使得研究对象仍然满足惯性系下牛顿第二定律而增加的一种虚拟力。 两个参考系下，由伽利略变换

item.title: 03 - Equations of Fluid Motions
item.description: 几大海洋方程 质量守恒方程 $$ \frac{\partial \rho}{\partial t}+\frac{\partial}{\partial x}(\rho u)+\frac{\partial}{\partial y}(\rho v)+\frac{\partial}{\partial z}(\rho w)=0 $$ 栋梁守恒方程 $$ \begin{aligned} &x: \rho\left(\frac{\mathrm{d} u}{\mathrm{d} t}+f_{*} w-f v\right)=-\frac{\partial p}{\partial x}+\frac{\partial \tau^{x x}}{\partial x}+\frac{\partial \tau^{x y}}{\partial y}+\frac{\partial \tau^{x z}}{\partial z}\ &y: \quad \rho\left(\frac{\mathrm{d} v}{\mathrm{d} t}+f u\right)=-\frac{\partial p}{\partial y}+\frac{\partial \tau^{x y}}{\partial x}+\frac{\partial \tau^{y y}}{\partial y}+\frac{\partial \tau^{y z}}{\partial z}\ &z: \rho\left(\frac{\mathrm{d} w}{\mathrm{d} t}-f_{*} u\right)=-\frac{\partial
